name: Box Nation [] Lets Go Build and Fight
name_original: Box Nation [] Lets Go Build and Fight
description:
Box Nation [ ] is a sandbox kind of game. In this box world, you can become a leader of your own nation. Your main goal in the game is to create and develop your nation of boxes.

MAIN FEATURES OF THE GAME:

- Create new boxes using the Mother box (that's a box with a "o");
- Connect boxes in any order you like;
- Mine resources to create your army of boxes;
- Fight against AI enemies and protect your Mother box.
